name: Ganymede Gate (Reboot)
description:
Ganymede Gate

(Alpha release 1, everything can/will break)

Ganymede Gate is a Sci-fi hell/horror Roguelike set on a human base in the jovian moon that has been invaded by a mysterious force. Your task is to get in and find what happened.

Currently the game has:

  • Kill a lot of enemies, everything that move is a target for you.
  • Get killed in 1 type of level generators: crumbling base.
